name: PricingCardThree
description: Pricing card with optional floating badge, price, plan name, two CTA buttons, and feature list.

description.example: Select the perfect plan for your needs

badge.note: Optional badge that floats above the card. Can be on ANY plan. Always exists but uses visible/invisible for consistent spacing.

badgeIcon.note: Optional Lucide icon to display next to badge

buttons.note: First button (index 0) = primary-button, second (index 1) = secondary-button. Button variant controlled by ThemeProvider's defaultButtonVariant. Border radius controlled by ThemeProvider's borderRadius. All sections should be wrapped in a single ThemeProvider at the app/page level.

features.note: Array of feature strings, required for visual consistency

propsSchema.plans: Array<{ id: string, badge?: string, badgeIcon?: LucideIcon, price: string, name: string, buttons: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>, features: string[] }>
propsSchema.animationType: 'none' | 'opacity' | 'slide-up' | 'scale-rotate' | 'blur-reveal' (required - controls GSAP scroll animations with stagger effect)
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)

usageExample: <PricingCardThree plans={[{ id: '1', price: '$10/mo', name: 'Basic plan', buttons: [{ text: 'Get started', onClick: () => console.log('clicked') }, { text: 'Chat to sales', onClick: () => console.log('chat') }], features: ['Up to 10 users', '20GB storage', 'Email support'] }, { id: '2', badge: 'Most popular plan', badgeIcon: Sparkles, price: '$20/mo', name: 'Business plan', buttons: [{ text: 'Get started', onClick: () => console.log('clicked') }, { text: 'Chat to sales', onClick: () => console.log('chat') }], features: ['Up to 20 users', '40GB storage', 'Priority support'] }]} title="Choose Your Plan" description="Find the perfect plan for your needs" textboxLayout="default" animationType="slide-up" useInvertedBackground={"noInvert"} />
